entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then sunny. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
